price: 194. Seigneur ! Accorde-nous ce que Tu nous as promis par le biais de Tes Messagers. Ne nous couvre pas d’opprobre au Jour de la Résurrection, car Tu ne manques jamais à Ta promesse ! »
arabic: رَبَّنَا وَءَاتِنَا مَا وَعَدتَّنَا عَلَىٰ رُسُلِكَ وَلَا تُخۡزِنَا يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِۖ إِنَّكَ لَا تُخۡلِفُ ٱلۡمِيعَادَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: rabbanā waātinā mā waʿadttanā ʿalā rusulika walā tukh'zinā yawma al-qiyāmati innaka lā tukh'lifu al-mīʿāda
